roleset.name: conquer, sorta

example.name: the one example
example.text: As Ruth, Moira Harris, a large and beautiful woman who may be our next Colleen Dewhurst, begins almost immediately [*]to overpower each of the men.
example.arg: Moira Harris, a large and beautiful woman who may be our next Colleen Dewhurst,

roleset.note: OVERPOWER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overpower' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from overpower.01-v predicate notes)
